EmailTemplate.description: Email notification for Broker referral leads
EmailTemplate.name: Broker Referral Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: NEW BROKER LEAD ASSIGNMENT NOTIFICATION
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*** NEW BROKER LEAD ASSIGNMENT NOTIFICATION ***
The following lead has been assigned to {!Lead.OwnerFullName}
Company: {!Lead.Company}
Name: {!Lead.Name}
Click on the link to access the lead directly: {!Lead.Link}
Click on the link to access the journey directly: {!Journey__c.Link}
Please read carefully and follow directions accordingly:
Select the lead link
Qualify the lead - reach out via phone or email
If unqualified, please update the lead status field to unqualified
If qualified:
Schedule a tour by selecting “manage tour”
DO NOT ENTER A TOUR IN SPACESTATION - this lead must be converted before becoming a potential in SpaceStation.
If the lead would like to take space at a future date - please select “follow up.” This feature will allow the Journey to return to your queue on that specific date.
If interested or would like to start the paperwork sending process, please “add opportunity.”
Leads/Contacts can be converted by "Adding Opportunity." See below:
Once selected you will select the "+" button. See below:
Once the "+" is selected a "Journey Opportunity" form will be required. Once completed, your contact/lead will be converted.
From here, please select “Send Paperwork”
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact salesforcesupport@wework.com
